name: Wiz
storyline: A long time ago the world was in harmony with balance between light and darkness. The Goddess had trained the strongest wizards in the kingdom, and each of them became guardian of one dimension. Everything was going well until the the Dark Wizard was consumed by the energy of the dimension of the shadows and ended up stealing the goddess's sealing sword, holding the power of the moon and gives the ability to control the dimensions. The other guardians tried to stop the Dark Wizard's uncontrolled force but they failed - only one of them survived, saved by Mido the protective wolf of light, who used all his energy to help Wiz survive. Mido's eventually captured by the Dark Wizard, and with possession of the sealing sword and the wolf guardian of light, the Dark Wizard reigns a new world where he instituted chaos and spread the energy of darkness affecting the minds of almost all existing creatures.
summary: Wiz is a 2D pixel-art Metroidvania focused on exploration and skilled combat with great rewards. Enter the world of Wiz and try saving the land to restore light and balance for all living creatures.
